comment: He is deeply invested in his research and consistently brings the latest insights into the classroom. His energy and passion for teaching set him apart from professors who seem disengaged he genuinely enjoys what he does. His grading is fair and transparent, and the class emphasizes learning over simply chasing grades.

I have taken this professor for both undergrad and grad level classes (cs4247 & cs6045) and he is simply an excellent professor. Typically posts lectures online after the in-person lecture. Gives the most feedback I've ever seen from any professor on hw, exams, and projects. Uses jokes and stories to keep you engaged. Very friendly. 10/10

This guy will make your life easy. Take him if you want to learn about natural language processing and not have to worry too much about passing or failing. Turn in your work on time and you'll do fine.

Advance algorithms class was wonderful, There were many HomeWorks and projects to be done but they were manageable. He is  available for any clarifications. His lectures were very interactive with real world scenarios. We had an extra credit which is an advantage.

He is one of the best professors I've had. His interactive teaching style and dedication to student success stand out. He's always approachable for clarifications, ensuring a deep understanding of topics. After an excellent experience in Advanced Algorithms, I eagerly enrolled in AI for Security and Privacy. Homework is practical and manageable!
